name: WandaVision
description: A project exploring alternate realities, artificial worlds, and the manipulation of time and space, just like Wanda Maximoff's journey in the alternate reality she creates in 'WandaVision'.

name: Loki
description: A project focused on exploring time manipulation and multiverse dynamics, inspired by the unpredictable journey of Loki as he navigates alternate timelines and realities.

name: The Falcon and the Winter Soldier
description: A project promoting collaboration and new beginnings, much like Sam Wilson and Bucky Barnes as they work together to navigate a world without Captain America and promote justice.

name: Hawkeye
description: A project focused on precision and accuracy, much like Clint Barton's expertise in archery, as he trains a new generation of heroes while confronting his own past.

name: What If...?
description: A project centered on exploring alternate realities, asking the question 'What if?' for key moments in history and seeing how they shape the multiverse, just like the 'What If...?' series.

name: Ms. Marvel
description: A project focused on empowerment and self-discovery, inspired by Kamala Khan as she embraces her new superpowers and becomes a hero in the Marvel universe.

name: Secret Invasion
description: A project centered around uncovering hidden threats and secrets, as Nick Fury and allies work to expose the invasion of Skrulls disguised as humans in the Marvel Universe.

name: She-Hulk: Attorney at Law
description: A project focused on the balance between law and superpowers, following Jennifer Walters as she navigates her career as a lawyer and her new life as She-Hulk.

name: Moon Knight
description: A project that delves into mental health, inner conflict, and vigilantism, inspired by Marc Spectorâ€™s transformation into Moon Knight as he battles his multiple personalities and crime.

name: Echo
description: A project exploring identity and heritage, as Maya Lopez (Echo) embarks on a personal journey of self-discovery and reconciliation with her past while embracing her role as a hero.
